# HUD::HAS_MENU_LAYOUT_CHANGED_EVENT_OCCURRED

## Summary
This should be checked every frame and when it returns true, check GET_MENU_LAYOUT_CHANGED_EVENT_DETAILS

## Returns
* **BOOL**
